title: Remco Evenepoel pips the peloton’s fastest sprinter to score time bonuses at the Vuelta a España
content:
Six more seconds in his pocket might come in handy with the second major climbing stage on tap at Javalambre on Thursday.

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel pips the peloton’s fastest sprinter to score time bonuses at the Vuelta a España on Velo.
author: ahood
